rows.label: tev018101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev018101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Hugo about schematics.

rows.label: tev018101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev018101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Hugo if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018101_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Hugo about battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Hugo if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Hugo about battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Hugo about battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_SEL5011
rows.name: Ask Hugo about battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_SEL5021
rows.name: Ask Hugo about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0001
rows.name:
When you find schematics, take them to
the AM terminal in Armory Alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you have the necessary materials on hand as well,
you can create new equipment right then and there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0003
rows.name:
They're not as good as the things I make, of course,
but regardless, I've heard you can obtain some pretty
great stuff that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0006
rows.name:
I had been developing new types of data probes,
but all my work ended up scattered with the remains
of the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0007
rows.name:
I know they would come in handy on BLADE missions,
but without prototypes, I couldn't get anyone to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG0008
rows.name:
If only there was a BLADE somewhere who was well-
acquainted with FrontierNav and willing to help me
resume developing such new probes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1001
rows.name:
That fuel recovery probe I gave you is a fantastic first
effort in hopefully a whole series of battle probes, don't
you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1002
rows.name:
Set one at a FrontierNav data probe site and it'll
accelerate the pace at which Skells parked within
that region recover fuel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1003
rows.name:
The way Skells burn through fuel, that's got to be
priceless in areas full of strong enemies, right? So put
them to good use and allow me to gather lots of data![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1008
rows.name:
I've heard talk that there are schematics for Skell
superweapons lurking out there somewhere.
Have you found anything like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1009
rows.name:
Apparently, the Arts unleashed by those weapons
are an order of magnitude more powerful than
the Arts from conventional weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1010
rows.name:
Under the right circumstances, they say they
have enough firepower to bring down a
tyrant in a single shot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG1011
rows.name:
If weapons like that really do exist, I'd sure love
to see 'em in action one day...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG2001
rows.name:
The melee attack probe is a powerful battle
probe that increases the melee attack of everyone
fighting within its range of effect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG2002
rows.name:
Once you set it, it'll let you take on even the most
well-armored foes in the region without fear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG2003
rows.name:
You know, I'm pretty close to finishing the plans for my
next battle probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG2004
rows.name:
Come see me again soon, all right?
I'll have another incredible invention to show you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG3001
rows.name:
If you install that new ranged attack probe I gave you,
everyone within that region will enjoy the benefits of
enhanced ranged attack power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG3002
rows.name:
Even the weakest of marksmen will suddenly be
shooting like they were divinely possessed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG3003
rows.name:
Now, what incredible, industry-shaking battle probe
type should I work on next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG3004
rows.name:
If you're ready for it, please work with me again!
At this point, you're the only one who will...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5001
rows.name:
If you install my attribute resistance probe, your
attribute resistances will be boosted for as long as
you're in that region, and you'll take less damage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5002
rows.name:
It will allow even the most mediocre of armors to
deflect enemy attacks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5003
rows.name:
All I ask in return is that you put all of these battle
probes I've given you to effective use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5004
rows.name:
That's the only way I can prove there are real-world
applications to my beloved inventions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5009
rows.name:
Now that I've been blessed with ample materials and
a talented staff, my research and development projects
are coming along quite nicely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5010
rows.name:
I fell into such deep despair when I lost all of the
battle probe prototypes I had been working on while
on board the White Whale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5011
rows.name:
But thanks to you, I was able to resume my research,
and develop even more advanced versions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018101_MSG5012
rows.name:
I may not be able to fight as you do, but I'll prove
that I can be a great asset to BLADE in my own way![ST:wait ]
